Bhanu Kumar, a lower-caste watchman stands guard over his feudal master's disused, barren silica mine. A creature of habit, Bhanu reflects powerlessness so complete it can only make the world stand still. But one night, a runaway couple in desperate search of refuge come to Bhanu seeking shelter. Bhanu must make a choice between habit and humanity. The rusted gate of the Royal Silica Mine opens exposing a bloody world of lust, fear & violence in the name of caste, ownership and honour.
